allow: Bash(for dir in reporting documents common admin testing)

Bash("backend\venv\Scripts\python.exe" -c "
import sys
sys.path.append(''backend'')
from backend.app.services.auth_service import AuthService
from backend.app.schemas.auth import UserCreate, UserRole

# Create demo user
auth_service = AuthService()
print(''Creating demo user...'')

try:
    demo_user = UserCreate(
        email=''demo@clo-system.com'',
        password=''demo123'',
        first_name=''Demo'',
        last_name=''User'',
        full_name=''Demo User'',
        role=UserRole.manager
    )
    
    user = auth_service.create_user(demo_user)
    print(f''Demo user created successfully: {user}'')
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Failed to create demo user: {e}'')
    
# Test authentication with email
print(''\nTesting authentication with email...'')
user = auth_service.authenticate_user(''demo@clo-system.com'', ''demo123'')
print(f''Authentication result: {user}'')
")

Bash("backend\venv\Scripts\python.exe" -c "
import sys
sys.path.append(''backend'')
from backend.app.services.auth_service import AuthService
from backend.app.schemas.auth import UserCreate, UserRole

# Create demo user
auth_service = AuthService()
print(''Creating demo user...'')

try:
    demo_user = UserCreate(
        email=''demo@clo-system.com'',
        password=''demo123'',
        full_name=''Demo User'',
        role=UserRole.MANAGER
    )
    
    user = auth_service.create_user(demo_user)
    print(f''Demo user created successfully: {user}'')
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Failed to create demo user: {e}'')
    # Try to get existing user
    existing_user = auth_service.get_user_by_email(''demo@clo-system.com'')
    if existing_user:
        print(f''Demo user already exists: {existing_user}'')
")

Bash("backend\venv\Scripts\python.exe" -c "
import sys
sys.path.append(''backend'')
from backend.app.services.auth_service import AuthService

auth_service = AuthService()

# Test password verification
print(''Testing password verification...'')
user = auth_service.get_user_by_email(''demo@clo-system.com'')
if user:
    print(f''User found: {user[""email""]}'')
    
    # Test various passwords
    passwords = [''demo123'', ''demo12345'', ''password123'', ''demoadmin'']
    for pwd in passwords:
        is_valid = auth_service.verify_password(pwd, user[''hashed_password''])
        print(f''Password ""{pwd}"": {is_valid}'')
else:
    print(''User not found'')
")
